A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can imagine the pitch meeting for this: "How about a cross between Star Wars\, the Ghost Busters reboot\, and an Adam Sandler movie?  The kids will love it!"

It was cringy.  Half a star for the fine acting by Mark Hamill and Adam Driver\, but I feel so sorry for them about the script they were forced to read from.

Above all\, don't take your kids to this movie.  Both my kids recoiled when Luke squeezed milk from the breast of a giant alien mermaid.  I'm not sure how this got a PG-13 rating.
